name: ZFS Pool Status
description: Monitors ZFS pool health if zpool is available.
check_cmd: if command -v zpool >/dev/null; then zpool status -x 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'all pools are healthy' && echo active || echo degraded; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v zpool >/dev/null; then zpool clear -a || true; fi
